completions.nl_description: Move every C object once in a direction, then extend the F if it's neighbor
Move all objects of color C towards the nearest neighboring object, and recolor them with the color of the neighboring object.
Move all objects of color C to the same column as the middle object of color R.
Move objects of size 1 or 2 diagonally neighborably with an object of color C, towards the nearest C.
completions.code: (do (rule (vars (this other)) (filter (and (or (size_equals (size_of this) 1) (size_equals (size_of this) 2)) (and (neighbor_of this other) (color_equals (color_of other) C)))) (apply (move_node (direction_of other)))))

completions.nl_description: Move all objects of color C one step up
Recolor all objects of color O to color B.
Move all objects of color C toward neighboring objects of color different than O and C, without overlapping.
Move all objects of color C to the position of the closest object of color B if they are at the same row.
Move all objects containing color C toward the object of color different than C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of size 1 to the right by one step, and if another object of size 1 is encountered, move it again to the right by one step.
Move and extend all objects of color C, leaving a trail without overlapping, towards neighboring objects of any color.
Move all objects of color different than O and F, toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than O, to align them in the same row or column toward the object of color O, if they are neighbors of it.
Adjacent colors to C are moved to the nearest empty space and replaced with C.
completions.code: (do (rule (vars (this other)) (filter (and (color_equals (color_of other) C) (neighbor_of this other))) (apply (move_node_max (direction_of other)) (update_color C) (noop) (noop) (noop) ) ) )

completions.nl_description: Recolor the grouped objects, adding them between the groups.
Move all objects of color C one step right, and then recolor them to color R.
Move all objects of color C and size 1 toward objects of any other different color that are neighbors. If they are already neighbors of such objects, extend them in that direction.
Recolor all objects of size 1 and 2 to the color C.
Move objects of size 2 to another location while retaining their direction, ensuring no overlap when moving.
Move all objects towards their neighboring C objects.
Move cyan objects within same size towards the location of cyan objects, if they are connected.
Move all C-colored objects towards other objects forming pairs.
Move all objects of color C one step up, and then insert a copy of these objects on their initial position.
Move all objects of color C one step up
Move all objects towards the nearest object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move the objects of color B one step up, and move objects of color Y to the position right to them
Reposition the objects such that the closest neighbors of color C are horizontally aligned with each other.
Move objects within pairs of neighbor columns to a neighbor column.
Recolor neighbors of objects of color C to color B.
Move all objects of color C toward the object of color R, if they are neighbors of it.
Move nodes of color O that are neighbors of nodes of color C, in a direction towards the nodes of color C.
Move all C objects downward by one step.
Move all objects one step toward the nearest object of color C.
Move all objects of color C to neighboring positions that contain objects, and then recolor them to color Y.
Move the color C objects one step up.
Move objects of size 3 one step up if they are neighbors of another object.
Insert objects of color equivalent to the maximum size to the positions of C objects.
Move all objects to the nearest neighboring position of object with color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color G or C one step to their top adjacent cell.
Move all objects of color C one step diagonally right-down and then recolor them to color B.
Move all objects of color C to the two nearest cells of objects of color F, and color the objects F as C and G as B
Move all objects of color C to the left if adjacent to any other object.
Move all colored objects to the position of their nearest neighboring object of a common color.
Move all objects towards the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it, without overlapping.
Move all objects of color C and size 1 downward.
Move the objects of color B one step toward the objects of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all the objects of color B one step up
Move all objects of color C two steps diagonally, and extend the moved objects with color C without overlapping.
Move all objects of color C towards the nearest object of a different color, if they are neighbors.
Recolor all objects of color G to B and move objects C toward the object of color F if they are neighbors.
Move objects of color Y and B towards objects of color C if they are neighbors.
Move all objects of size 1 next to another object of any color and size, and recolor them to color B.
Rotate objects of color C by 90 degrees.
Move all objects of color C to the bottom-right direction, and then recolor them to the color of the neighboring object.
Move all objects of color C to all the neighboring objects of color different than C and then move the neighbor object to the position of the source.
Move all blue objects (B) towards the nearest cyan object (C) when they are neighbors.
Move all objects of color C to the positions of their neighboring objects and retain the color of the neighboring objects.
Move all objects of color C one step up, if they are neighbors of an object of color different than C.
Move all objects of color C toward any neighboring objects.
Move all objects of color C one step to the right, and then if they are neighbors of the F colored object, recolor them to color F.
Move all 'Y' colored objects that neighbor a 'C' colored object towards their 'C' colored neighbor.
Move all objects of color different than C, toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move the cyan colored objects toward neighboring objects, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of size 1 towards the nearest object of color different than O.
Move all objects of size 2 one step up, and then recolor them to color C.
Move all isolated objects of color 'C' towards objects of color 'Y' or 'R' if they are neighbors, without overlaps.
Move all objects of color C one step towards each neighboring object of color R.
Move all objects of color C one step towards objects of adjacent color Y or R, if they are neighbors.
Recolor each object that spans across multiple cells horizontally, so that the center cells are recolored to the same color as the object.
Extend all objects towards another object of the same color if they are neighbors, without overlapping.
Move specific objects diagonally
Move all objects C toward neighboring object R.
Move the 'C' objects in input grid towards the nearest neighbor cells of another 'C' object and also towards 'R' objects if they are neighbors.
Move all objects of color Y toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move objects of color C if they are neighbors of objects of color F one step toward them, then recolor these objects to Y.
Recolor the neighboring objects of maximum size C to color Y
Move all objects that are neighbors of an object of color C, one step toward it.
Move all objects of color C, insert a copy of it at the position of the next Y color, if they are neighbors of a Y color.
Move all objects of color different than C, toward the nearest object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color C neighbor to another color object in the direction of their neighbors, and then recolor them to color C.
Move all objects of color C to position next to an object of color R if they are neighbors, and extend them by creating new objects with color Y.
Reposition all objects of color different than C, if they are neighbors of an object of color C, to be neighbors of the object in the same relative position.
Move all objects of color Y or B toward a neighbor object of color C and recolor to C.
Move all objects with color C to the maximum possible distance vertically.
Insert the object of color C at the position of the object of color Y when they are neighbors.
Move all objects of color C one step up, if they have any neighboring object.
Move all objects of color C to the top left corners.
Insert objects of color Y next to objects of color C
Move all objects of size 2 toward the nearest neighbor object of size 1 that is in the same column, without overlapping.
Move nodes to new positions and aggregate after encountering another object of color C.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this other))
        (filter (color_equals (color_of other) C))
        (apply (move_node (direction_of other)))
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Move all objects of color C toward the object of color R, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of the 'C' color, surrounded by at least one other object, one step outwards, toward all its neighboring objects and recolor them to 'G'.
Extend all objects of size 1 towards objects of color C, without overlapping.
Move objects of color F towards the objects of color C, if they are neighbors.
Insert a copy of the object where each original object of color C appears, positioning the copy in the middle.
Move all objects C by one step to the right.
Extend all objects of color C toward the nearest neighboring object, without overlapping.
Move all objects of color C left and right to form vertical lines with other objects of color.
Move all objects of color C one step towards neighboring nodes of different colors
Move all objects of color different than O one step toward the neighboring C objects.
Insert a copy of the smallest object at the position of the biggest object.
Move all objects of size 1 towards another object of the same color if they are neighbors.
Move all objects of color O one step diagonally towards the closest object of color C, if they are neighbors, and recolor them to match the closest object's color.
Move all objects of color C towards all objects of color R if they are neighbors.
Inside the grid, swap any Brown objects with contiguous Cyan objects, and Brown objects with any contiguous Red objects.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this other))
        (filter (and (or (color_equals (color_of this) B) (color_equals (color_of this) R)) (and (neighbor_of this other) (or (color_equals (color_of other) C) (color_equals (color_of other) Y)))))
        (apply (move_node_max (direction_of other)))
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Insert an adjacent copy of each object of color C.
